title: Dream Eater
description: Shortlisted for Global Design Graduate Show 2023 Dream Eater is an immersive, interactive environment that functions as a stimulating playground of digital objects, developed using Unity Engine, Blender, and salvaged game assets. The project explores how kit bashing can shape regenerative practices in virtual materials. By reassembling digital found objects, 'Dream Eater' aims to demonstrate how this approach can bring more playfulness to 3D modelling, making it more accessible to both beginners and experienced users. Drawing on nostalgic imagery, the game uses childhood experiences as a framework for exploring intersections between Ontology, Semiology, and Pervasive Game Theory.
